spirit:field.spirit:name: major
spirit:field.spirit:description: Major version

spirit:field.spirit:name: minor
spirit:field.spirit:description: Minor version

spirit:field.spirit:name: patch
spirit:field.spirit:description: Patch version

spirit:field.spirit:name: sck_freerun
spirit:field.spirit:description: SCK Freerun (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: io_out_defaults
spirit:field.spirit:description: Output value for each IO when not active

spirit:field.spirit:name: io_tri_defaults
spirit:field.spirit:description: Tri-State value for each IO when not active

spirit:field.spirit:name: sck_oe_deassert_cfg
spirit:field.spirit:description: SCK OE deassert configuration 0 : one cycle before last action finish 1 : aligned with last action finish 2-15 : n-1 (1-14) cycles after last action finish

spirit:field.spirit:name: cs_deassert_cfg
spirit:field.spirit:description: CS deassert configuration 0 : one cycle before last action finish 1 : aligned with last action finish 2-15 : n-1 (1-14) cycles after last action finish

spirit:field.spirit:name: sck_oe_assert_cfg
spirit:field.spirit:description: SCK OE assert configuration 0 : one cycle after first action start 1 : aligned with first action start 2-15 : n-1 (1-14) cycles before first action start

spirit:field.spirit:name: cs_assert_cfg
spirit:field.spirit:description: CS assert configuration 0 : one cycle after first action start 1 : aligned with first action start 2-15 : n-1 (1-14) cycles before first action start

spirit:field.spirit:name: val
spirit:field.spirit:description: Address Offset - This is the offset from the address

spirit:field.spirit:name: val
spirit:field.spirit:description: Address

spirit:field.spirit:name: tr_gap_p3
spirit:field.spirit:description: Minimum number of SPI clock cycles + 3 that CS should be deasserted after a command

spirit:field.spirit:name: io_mask_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: IO mask for the data - 0 means no data

spirit:field.spirit:name: io_mask_addr
spirit:field.spirit:description: IO mask for the address - 0 means no address

spirit:field.spirit:name: io_mask_cmd
spirit:field.spirit:description: IO mask for the command - 0 means no command

spirit:field.spirit:name: go
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write a 1 to initiate a SPI transaction. HW will clear this field upon completion and also generate an interrupt. A new transaction should not be attempted until this field returns a 0, indicating it is not busy.

spirit:field.spirit:name: addr_mode
spirit:field.spirit:description: Address mode 0 : 3-bytes 1 : 4-bytes

spirit:field.spirit:name: write
spirit:field.spirit:description: Read or Write Data (only used if io_mask_data != 0) 0 : Read Data 1 : Write Data

spirit:field.spirit:name: num_dummy_clks
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of dummy clock cycles - 0 means no dummy clock cycles

spirit:field.spirit:name: num_bytes
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of data bytes (0 stops when FIFO is full/empty)

spirit:field.spirit:name: cmd
spirit:field.spirit:description: Command

spirit:field.spirit:name: val
spirit:field.spirit:description: Word to write into the output FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: val
spirit:field.spirit:description: Word to read from the input FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_clear
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full status field. A 1 indicates an almost full or full FIFO. This bit is set when there are between fifo_aft and fifo_depth number of entries in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty status field. A 1 indicates an almost empty or empty FIFO. This bit is set when there are between 0 and fifo_aet number of entries in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO full status field. A 1 indicates a full FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO empty status field. A 1 indicates an empty FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_aft
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full threshold

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_aet
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty threshold

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth (always 4 bytes wide)

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_clear
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full status field. A 1 indicates an almost full or full FIFO. This bit is set when there are between fifo_aft and fifo_depth number of entries in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty status field. A 1 indicates an almost empty or empty FIFO. This bit is set when there are between 0 and fifo_aet number of entries in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO full status field. A 1 indicates a full FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO empty status field. A 1 indicates an empty FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_aft
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full threshold

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_aet
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty threshold

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth (always 4 bytes wide)

spirit:field.spirit:name: val
spirit:field.spirit:description: Address Offset - This is the offset from the address

spirit:field.spirit:name: addr_mode
spirit:field.spirit:description: Address mode 0 : 3-bytes 1 : 4-bytes

spirit:field.spirit:name: num_dummy_clks
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of dummy clock cycles - 0 means no dummy clock cycles

spirit:field.spirit:name: tr_gap_p3
spirit:field.spirit:description: Minimum number of SPI clock cycles + 3 that CS should be deasserted after a read command

spirit:field.spirit:name: io_mask_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: IO mask for the read data

spirit:field.spirit:name: io_mask_addr
spirit:field.spirit:description: IO mask for the address

spirit:field.spirit:name: io_mask_cmd
spirit:field.spirit:description: IO mask for the read command

spirit:field.spirit:name: read_cmd
spirit:field.spirit:description: Read command

spirit:field.spirit:name: xip_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: XIP Enable - The first read transaction following the assertion of this bit will have the basic_cfg.read_cmd and xip_cfg.mode_xip bits - Following read transactions will not have a read command and will use xip_cfg.mode_xip bits - The read transaction following the de-assertion of this bit will not have a read command and use xip_cfg.mode_normal bits - Following read transactions will use basic_cfg.read_cmd and xip_cfg.mode_normal bits (Default)

spirit:field.spirit:name: io_mask_mode
spirit:field.spirit:description: IO Mask for the mode bits

spirit:field.spirit:name: num_mode_bits
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of mode bits to send - 0 means no mode bits are sent - 8 is the maximum

spirit:field.spirit:name: mode_xip
spirit:field.spirit:description: Mode bits when there is no command (XIP mode)

spirit:field.spirit:name: mode_normal
spirit:field.spirit:description: Mode bits when there is an command (normal read mode)

spirit:field.spirit:name: tr_gap_p3
spirit:field.spirit:description: Minimum number of SPI clock cycles + 3 that CS should be deasserted after suspend command

spirit:field.spirit:name: enable
spirit:field.spirit:description: This should be set by SW when a suspend command should be executed before an incoming read request can be handled. This would be the case if a program or erase is in progress. This bit gets cleared as soon as the suspend command is executed.

spirit:field.spirit:name: io_mask
spirit:field.spirit:description: IO Mask for the suspend command

spirit:field.spirit:name: cmd
spirit:field.spirit:description: Suspend command

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: irq
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: SPI Flash Controller Interrupt register group

spirit:register.spirit:name: enable
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Enable register - Write 1 to enable, 0 to mask an interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: apb_tr_done
spirit:field.spirit:description: APB SPI Flash transaction done

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Output FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Output FIFO almost empty NOTE: If the FIFO is empty when this interrupt is enabled, it will cause an interrupt right away!

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Input FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Input FIFO almost empty interrupt mask - Write 1 to enable NOTE: If the FIFO is empty when this interrupt is enabled, it will cause an interrupt right away!

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending
spirit:register.spirit:description: Pending register - This indicates which events are pending, Write 1 to clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: apb_tr_done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High APB SPI Flash transaction done

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High Output FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active High Output FIFO almost empty NOTE: If the FIFO is empty, this event is pending and if enabled will cause an interrupt!

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High Input FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active High Input FIFO almost empty NOTE: If the FIFO is empty, this event is pending and if enabled will cause an interrupt!

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending_irq
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which pending events are enabled to cause an interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: apb_tr_done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High APB SPI Flash transaction done

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High Output FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active High Output FIFO almost empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High Input FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active High Input FIFO almost empty

spirit:register.spirit:name: raw
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register contains the registered state of interrupt signals

spirit:field.spirit:name: apb_tr_done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the APB SPI Flash transaction done flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the output FIFO almost full flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the output FIFO almost empty flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the input FIFO almost full flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the input FIFO almost empty flag (Active-High)

variant.name: none
variant.doc: 'none' variant states including all templates which are not assigned any variant property.
